video.title: The Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
video.synopsis: Hyper hedgehog Sonic and his cohort Miles "Tails" Prower defend the planet Mobius against Dr. Robotnik and his evil schemes in this animated series.

seasons.title: The Best Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog

episodes.synopsis: Sonic outsmarts Coconuts and then stumbles into a convention of bounty hunter robots, where Robotnik puts a price on his head.
episodes.title: Super Special Sonic Search and Smash Squad

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and Tails find an underground world of diamonds, but they are held captive there by a miserly Mole-Troll.
episodes.title: Subterranean Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Sonic saves a damsel in distress and falls in love with her, not knowing she's a robot built by Robotnik.
episodes.title: Lovesick Sonic

episodes.synopsis: Scratch and Grounder use Robotnik's new slo-mo ray gun to capture Sonic.
episodes.title: Sloww Going

episodes.synopsis: Tails and other Mobius citizens are lured into Robotnik's robotic games of chance, and when they lose, they're sent to slave labor camps.
episodes.title: High-Stakes Sonic

episodes.synopsis: In order to free Sketch Lampoon, a satirical comic book artist, from Robotnik's new high-security prison, Sonic allows himself to be captured.
episodes.title: Sonic Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Tails gets trapped in the Warp of Confusion by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik.
episodes.title: Trail of the Missing Tails

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and Tails befriend a pair of aliens who crash-land their spaceship on Mobius.
episodes.title: Close Encounter of the Sonic Kind

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik's momma escapes from the home for mothers of villains and demands her birthday present.
episodes.title: Momma Robotnik's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Coconuts is exiled by Robotnik to a remote jungle, where he uses a giant baby ape to destroy villages.
episodes.title: King Coconuts

episodes.synopsis: Outraged by a new hit song written about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius and then takes pop star Catty Carlisle captive.
episodes.title: Sonic's Song

episodes.synopsis: A fast-talking traveling salesman named Wes Weasley sells Robotnik various hedgehog-catching gadgets, including the Darkenator and the De-Atomizer.
episodes.title: Birth of a Salesman

episodes.synopsis: Sonic rescues Lucas, a rival of Robotnik's, from Robotnik's dungeons. But Robotnik will do anything to keep Lucas from finding his lost love, Lucinda.
episodes.title: Best Hedgehog

episodes.synopsis: The leader of a group of biker bears mistakes Scratch and Grounder for Sonic and Tails and teams up with the pair to attack the real Sonic and Tails.
episodes.title: The Robotnik Express

episodes.synopsis: Tails gets a megadose of Robotnik's growth gas and grows quickly to monstrous proportions, eating everything in sight and terrorizing the countryside.
episodes.title: Too Tall Tails

episodes.synopsis: When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home, Robotnik finds out and creates a robot fox family, who pose as Tails's long-lost parents.
episodes.title: Tails' New Home

episodes.synopsis: An elderly, out-of-shape, overweight superhero keeps trying to help Sonic battle Dr. Robotnik -- and keeps getting Sonic in more jeopardy.
episodes.title: Over The Hill Hero

episodes.synopsis: After an accident, Scratch thinks he's an eagle and on Sonic's side.
episodes.title: Blank Headed

episodes.synopsis: Sonic turns detective to solve the mystery of his missing red sneakers.
episodes.title: Mystery of the Missing Hi-Tops

episodes.synopsis: Tails adopts a cute and fuzzy pet named Walter, who turns out to be a black hole.
episodes.title: Goodbye Sucker
